Course Description:
ACCOUNTING FOR BUSINESS INFORMATION REQUIREMENTS WITH COST ACCOUNTING CONCEPTS AND RELATIONSHIPS, STATEMENT OF CASH FLOWS, FINANCIAL STATEMENT ANALYSIS, COST-VOLUME-PROFIT ANALYSIS, VARIANCE
ANALYSIS, BUDGETING, PRICING DECISIONS, CAPITAL EXPENDITURE DECISIONS, AND MANAGEMENT ACCOUNTING ANALYSIS FOR DECISION-MAKING.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
